item.title: 牛肉有望成为新的鸡蛋，关税加剧了短缺担忧
item.description: 鸡蛋是去年冬天食品通胀的典型代表。汉堡可能是下一个。【原文：Eggs were the poster child for food inflation last winter. Burgers could be the next.】

item.title: 整体坏情绪中的新坏东西
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 埃克森首席执行官称新型石墨可提高电动汽车电池寿命并延长续航里程
item.description:
埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp. ）表示，该公司发明了一种新型石墨，可将电动汽车电池的寿命延长 30% 之多

。【原文：

Exxon Mobil Corp. said it has invented a new form of graphite that can increase the life of electric-vehicle batteries by as much as 30%

】

item.title: 欧盟与印度进行 "紧张 "会谈以达成贸易协议
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）内阁的一位高级部长表示，欧盟和印度正在尽最大努力敲定一项自由贸易协定，因为这个南亚国家在遭受关税打击后正试图将其贸易关系扩大到美国之外。【原文：The European Union and India are maximizing efforts to finalize a free trade agreement, a top minister in Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s cabinet said, as the South Asian nation tries to broaden its trade relations beyond the US after being hit by tariffs.】

item.title: Tether 推出新的美国稳定币，Bo Hines 将领导该项目
item.description: 全球最大的稳定币发行商 Tether Holdings SA 正在创建受美国监管的数字美元版本，并已聘请前白宫加密货币官员 Bo Hines 来管理该企业。【原文：Tether Holdings SA, the world’s largest stablecoin issuer, is creating a US-regulated version of its digital dollar and has tapped Bo Hines, a former White House crypto official, to run the venture.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦将在 12 月前通过人民币债券筹资 2.5 亿美元
item.description: 巴基斯坦计划在今年 12 月前发行首批熊猫债券，加入寻求资金来源多样化的众多国家行列。【原文：Pakistan plans to issue its inaugural tranche of Panda bonds before December this year, joining a host of countries looking to diversify their funding sources.】

item.title: 据说 Apax 将选择野村和瑞银出售保险公司 Gamalife
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，私募股权公司 Apax Partners 已选择野村控股公司和瑞银集团帮助安排欧洲寿险整合商 Gamalife 的潜在出售事宜。【原文：Private equity firm Apax Partners has picked Nomura Holdings Inc. and UBS Group AG to help arrange a potential sale of European life insurance consolidator Gamalife, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国融资市场进入成本上升的波动新时代
item.description: 近二十年来，美国的融资市场一直充斥着容易获得的廉价现金，但现在似乎正在进入借贷成本上升的新阶段，这令投资者和政策制定者感到担忧。【原文：US funding markets, which have been awash with easily accessible and cheap cash for nearly two decades, appear to be entering a new phase of higher borrowing costs posing a worry for investors and policymakers.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟垃圾债券因派拉蒙计划竞购而扩大涨幅
item.description: 据报道，派拉蒙天空舞蹈公司（Paramount Skydance Corp）正准备竞购华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.【原文：Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. junk bonds extended their climbs on Friday following reports that Paramount Skydance Corp. is preparing a bid for the company.】

item.title: 腾讯聘请 OpenAI 研究员，中国加大人才搜寻力度
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，腾讯控股有限公司已从 OpenAI 招聘了一名著名的人工智能研究员，这是美国人工智能领域向中国投诚的最引人注目的事件之一。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd. has recruited a prominent artificial intelligence researcher from OpenAI in one of the most high-profile defections from the US AI sector to China, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Sunnova 获准就破产偿付寻求债权人投票
item.description: 今年 6 月申请破产的屋顶太阳能公司 Sunnova Energy International Inc.【原文：Sunnova Energy International Inc., the rooftop solar firm that filed for bankruptcy in June, won court permission to send its payout plan to creditors for a vote.】

item.title: OpenAI 希望创建一家公益公司。这意味着什么？
item.description: 经过数月与监管机构和利益相关者的反复沟通，OpenAI 表示，它越来越接近于转变为一家更传统的营利性公司--这是它争取获得数十亿美元资金以打造尖端人工智能产品的关键一步。【原文：After months of back-and-forth with regulators and stakeholders, OpenAI said it’s getting closer to converting into a more traditional, for-profit company – a key step in its bid to secure billions more in capital to build cutting-edge artificial intelligence products.】

item.title: 就业忧虑导致美国消费者信心降至五月份以来最低点
item.description: 由于对劳动力市场和物价的担忧影响了经济前景，9 月份美国消费者情绪降至 5 月份以来的最低点，长期通胀预期连续第二个月上升。【原文：US consumer sentiment fell in September to the lowest since May and long-term inflation expectations rose for the second straight month, as concerns about the labor market and prices weighed on the economic outlook.】

item.title: 华尔街、私人债务为 GTCR Zentiva 交易准备 36 亿欧元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，包括高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Wall Street banks including Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and private credit lenders are lining up around €3.6 billion ($4.2 billion) of debt financing to back buyout firm GTCR’s acquisition of generic drugmaker Zentiva Group AS, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 三色公司的突然倒闭再次引发人们对次贷消费者痛苦的担忧
item.description: 多年来，经济最拮据的美国人一直拖欠汽车贷款和其他贷款。然而，美国经济却似乎浑然不觉，继续向前发展。【原文：For years, the most financially strapped Americans have been falling steadily behind on their car payments and other loans too. And yet the US economy has trucked along, seemingly oblivious.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会调查亚马逊和谷歌搜索广告行为
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国联邦贸易委员会正在调查亚马逊公司和 Alphabet 公司旗下的谷歌是否误导了在其网站上投放广告的广告商。【原文：The US Federal Trade Commission is investigating whether Amazon.com Inc. and Alphabet Inc.’s Google misled advertisers that place ads on their websites, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 盎格鲁收购泰克，让大型矿业竞争对手步步后退
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）收购泰克资源有限公司（Teck Resources Ltd.）后，竞争对手的矿业高管们迅速与银行家和顾问通了电话，以了解有关这笔价值约 600 亿美元的交易的更多信息；他们意识到，矿业界的两项大奖都与他们失之交臂。【原文：Anglo American Plc’s swoop for Teck Resources Ltd. swiftly found rival mining executives jumping on calls with bankers and advisers to find out more about the roughly $60 billion deal — realizing that two of mining’s best prizes had eluded them.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利认为美联储将在 2026 年初加快减息步伐
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的经济学家预计，随着通胀放缓和劳动力市场疲软，美联储将在 1 月份之前的四次会议上连续降息，从而加快宽松步伐。【原文：Morgan Stanley economists expect the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates at four consecutive meetings through January as slowing inflation and a weakening labor market enable the central bank to quicken the pace of easing.】

item.title: 小额贷款市场以创纪录的速度增长，今年将达到 4000 亿美元
item.description: 市政债券市场今年的债务销售额刚刚达到 4000 亿美元，远远超过了去年已经很高的水平。【原文：The municipal-bond market just reached $400 billion in debt sales for the year, running far ahead of the already elevated levels seen last year.】

item.title: 阿根廷放任比索暴跌，然后出手控制损失
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统的政府本周出人意料地允许比索走软，同时采取行动防止货币抢购潮演变成重新引发通货膨胀的踩踏事件。【原文：President Javier Milei’s administration unexpectedly allowed the peso to weaken this week, while simultaneously moving to prevent the rush out of the currency from turning into a stampede that would reignite inflation.】

item.title: WisdomTree 以 25 美元入股区块链私人债务风险敞口
item.description: WisdomTree Inc. 推出了首支代币化基金，为投资者提供私人信贷风险敞口，标志着华尔街利用区块链技术连接快速增长市场的最新尝试。【原文：WisdomTree Inc. launched its first tokenized fund that gives investors exposure to private credit, marking the latest attempt by Wall Street to connect fast-growing markets with blockchain technology.】

item.title: 印度放宽最低股票发售规模，促进巨型公司 IPO
item.description: 印度证券市场监管机构周五为大型私营公司在今年全球首次股票销售量最大的国家之一上市提供了便利。【原文：India’s securities market regulator on Friday made it easier for mega-cap private companies to go public in one of the world’s top destinations for first-time share sales this year.】

item.title: 迪拜房地产开发商宾哈蒂为可能的首次公开募股做准备
item.description: 总部位于迪拜的开发商宾哈蒂控股有限公司（Binghatti Holding Ltd.）已开始为可能的首次公开募股做准备，以充分利用席卷迪拜的多年房地产热潮。【原文：Dubai-based developer Binghatti Holding Ltd. has started preparations for a potential initial public offering, as it seeks to capitalize on the multi-year real estate boom sweeping the emirate.】

item.title: 苹果公司推迟在中国大陆发布新款 iPhone Air
item.description: 苹果公司以监管审批问题为由，推迟在中国大陆推出新款 iPhone Air。【原文：Apple Inc. delayed the launch of its new iPhone Air in mainland China, citing regulatory approval issues.】

item.title: 微软首席执行官支持的 Groww 将公开申请在印度上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度最大投资平台 Groww 的母公司 Billionbrains Garage Ventures Ltd. 正准备最早于下周在孟买申请首次公开募股。【原文：Billionbrains Garage Ventures Ltd., the parent of India’s largest investment platform Groww, is preparing to file for an initial public offering in Mumbai as early as next week, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 石油需求监测机构警告中国石油产量激增可能导致库存紧张
item.description: 一家主要预测机构警告说，全球石油市场面临着每天约 300 万桶的 "难以维持 "的过剩，中国最近的囤积行动可以消化掉多少石油，这是个考验。【原文：The global oil market faces an “untenable” surplus of about 3 million barrels a day, testing how much can be absorbed by China’s recent stockpiling drive, a major forecasting agency has warned.】

item.title: 波哥大最昂贵的新公寓打破了哥伦比亚住房市场的不景气局面

在这个新建筑基本处于停滞状态的城市，一座豪华建筑群正从原来的零散房产中崛起。【原文：

item.title: 市政债券基金崩溃暴露垃圾债务的危险性
item.description: 今年 6 月，布莱恩-卡茨（Brian Katz）正在参加儿子从西北大学（Northwestern University）举行的大学毕业典礼，突然收到他的财务顾问发来的短信，说他们需要谈谈。几天后，理财顾问告诉卡茨，他从 2022 年开始投资的市政债券基金遭受了重大损失。【原文：Brian Katz was at his son’s college graduation from Northwestern University in June when he got a text from his financial adviser saying they needed to talk. A few days later the adviser told Katz that the municipal bond fund he put money in since 2022 had suffered major losses.】
